awards:
第54届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2019)
　　东方阵营奖(提名) 帕沃尔·佩卡尔奇克

writer.name: 帕沃尔·佩卡尔奇克 Pavol Pekarcik

director.name: 帕沃尔·佩卡尔奇克 Pavol Pekarcik

introduction: The heroes of the four stories told in Silent Days all have their dreams and desires. But they also have something else in common: they live on the fringes of society in a private world closed off from the outside – even more so since they cannot hear… In a film partaking of both fiction and documentary, hearing-impaired Romany children move about in their own environment as director Pavol Pekarčík deftly textures little stories reflecting their inner lives.
